p: Viral nucleic acids (NAs) were expressed as log10 viral NAs/10 μl of infected cells treated with TEO and of virus control and plotted against the non-cytotoxic drug concentrations. By comparing viral load of untreated infected cells (6.53 log10 viral NAs /10 μl) with infected cells treated with TEO at 13.5 and 27 μg/ml a decrease of 0.61 ( p = 0.0005) and 1.34 ( p < 0.0001) log10 NAs/10 μl, respectively was observed ( Fig. 1B).
